about_the_game:
Tokyo is a city of lights and a city of encounters.

What are the odds you ended up here the same night your crush is in town?

For some reason, Suki's staying in an upscale hotel all alone; something doesn't seem right. Using the in-game "smart phone" and its apps, complete missions by exchanging messages with her. Find out what she likes and what makes her laugh. Who knows, you may end up getting an invite back to her hotel.

16 missions to complete which unlock 16 cute and sexy poses. All clothing can be removed with free controls to rotate, pan, and zoom in on Suki's body.

Before buying, please try out the free demo with two missions and poses to see if Suki turns you on.

Note: While inspired by real conversations and stories, the game as a whole is a work of fiction.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains full nudity, sexually suggestive dialogue, and occasional censored cursing.

legal_notice: This product is for personal use only. It may not be used for any commercial or public work. It may not be redistributed in any shape or form. Sharing screenshots or gameplay videos is okay. Thank you for your cooperation!
name: Silk Suki - Chat Messaging Game

package_groups.title: Buy Silk Suki - Chat Messaging Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: entry-level Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 230 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: HDD supported but longer initial load times
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 Bit or Windows® 11
  • Processor: mid-tier Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 230 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended for faster load times

short_description: Spend a night with Suki. Exchange text messages, complete missions, unlock poses, and fully undress her. 16 kawaii poses to unlock, and all clothing can be removed. Try out the free demo.
